snippet: Entrepreneurs and small aerospace companies based at an air and space port in California are among those thought to be leading the next phase of space exploration.
abstract: Mojave Air and Space Port in Mojave, California, is home to a burgeoning community of entrepreneurs and small aerospace companies that are working to establish the next phase in space exploration; community, composed of both well-financed ventures and do-it-yourself start-ups, has drawn comparisons to Silicon Valley.
lead_paragraph: Entrepreneurs and small aerospace companies based at an air and space port in California are among those thought to be leading the next phase of space exploration.

headline.seo: A California Desert Town on the Way Up ... to Space
headline.main: A Desert Town on the Way Up ... to Space
headline.print_headline: In California Desert, a Town On the Way Up ... to Space
